name: media-tracker
description: A website you can use to track the movies you watch, the books you read, and more

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:babel && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:static && npm run build:final
scripts.build:babel: npx tsc && npx babel src/scripts --out-dir build/babel/scripts --extensions '.ts,.tsx'
scripts.build:final: cp -R build/static/ build/final && cp -R build/bundle/ build/final

author: Thomas Smith
